title: KYC Documents
description: The KYC (Know Your Customer) procedure verifies your identity in compliance with current regulations.

required.label: Documents required
required.description: OVHcloud needs to verify your identity. Please submit the requested documents.

pending.label: Under review
pending.description: Your documents have been received and are being reviewed by our team.

open.label: Procedure in progress
open.description: A verification procedure is in progress on your account.

closed.label: Verified
closed.description: Your identity has been successfully verified.

none.label: No procedure
none.description: No document verification is required at this time.

upload.dropZone: Drag and drop your files here or click to select
upload.formats: Accepted formats: JPG, PNG, PDF (max 10 MB per file)
upload.successMessage: Your documents have been submitted. Processing time is typically 2-5 business days. You will be notified by email.

pending.processingTime: Processing time is typically 2 to 5 business days. You will be notified by email once the verification is complete.

none.futureNotice: If verification is required in the future, you will be notified by email.

info.title: About KYC verification
info.description: Verifying your identity helps us secure your account and comply with anti-fraud regulations. Your documents are processed confidentially and securely.
